name: Micro-Matt
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement and Jump

Click - Shoot

Space - Dash

1 or 2 - Change gun

3 or 4 - Change Virus Type

Instructions: Look for an exe file called "Micro-Matt.exe" and start it. If it doesn't let you run the exe file it might be because your antivirus blocked it, I think this happens because it isn't downloaded often.

You play as an antivirus called Matt, you are put into somebody's computer. Little do you know you aren't alone... The computer is riddled with viruses. Your objective is to destroy the viruses and get out alive.

Made in Pygame for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. The theme was "You're not alone." This was my first time ever coding, the only experience I had was some basic skills in Python. It pretty much just became a little demo where you can mess around for a few minutes since I never really finished it. It might get some updates but for now its mostly just a test. It was also converted to an exe file using PyInstaller.
